title: [Health] Most B.C. kids and adults younger than 60 infected with COVID-19 or vaccinated. The proportion of those with COVID-19 antibodies rose to 56 per cent in June 2021 as vaccines were rolled out. It shot to 95 per cent in August of this year through a combination of vaccination and infection
[Health] A very recent review on SARS-CoV 2 viral load and shedding kinetics. A little bit of new light in this rapidly changing field.
